JointVcfFiltering.gatk_docker: Use a GATK docker built off of master anytime after Aug 9 (commit 05a76349aac401cc5d08ad0375c45fa9d4c7c864)
JointVcfFiltering.snp_annotations: -A AS_ReadPosRankSum -A AS_FS -A AS_SOR -A AS_QD -A AVERAGE_TREE_SCORE -A AVERAGE_ASSEMBLED_HAPS -A AVERAGE_FILTERED_HAPS
JointVcfFiltering.indel_annotations: -A AS_MQRankSum -A AS_ReadPosRankSum -A AS_FS -A AS_SOR -A AS_QD -A AVERAGE_TREE_SCORE
